name: Press Conference
description: The idea of opponents/opposition which occupies a central role in gaming also pervades the world around us. Media plays a critical role in showing such “live” oppositions in settings like press conferences and talk shows. What ensues in such settings is always a dialogue that resembles a game with opponents taking turns, playing with force and striving for triumphant victory. Press Conference Live simultaneously envisages in real life and in play opposition through the medium of a conceptual game.
